charges.charge_description: 18:371 CONSPIRACY TO COMMIT SECURITIES FRAUD AND TO MAKE FALSE STATEMENTS TO AUDITORS (1)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total of 6 months on each of counts 1 and 2 to run concurrent with one another and with the term of imprisonment imposed under information 98 cr 884 (MBM). Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of 3 years. Defendant is to pay a fine in the amount of $10, 000.00 in equal monthly installments during the time defendant is on supervised release. (1)
